content: hanjan crochet s rie se h s a st n r a y v_stitch blanket this blanket really is a classic that anyone can tackle all you need is a bunch of your favourite coloured yarns ­ as many or as few as you like ­ and you re away using just a one row repeat this is the perfect beginner project to practise your technique and gauge yarn y a r n c d h k o y ic a e r n ­ a o p f p yo ro u x r h o o k 5mm/h si ze th b e l a fi n n k is e h t ed g a u ge row 12 s s t = 1 a 0 n c d m 8 by measures 65cm 10cm 200g by 75cm hanjan crochet v­stitch blanket pattern yarn coming soon stitch tutorials about 200g of any double knit wool of your choice visit hanjancrochet com to find out more pattern ok o h foundation chain ch79 multiple of 2+1 5mm/h row 1 2tr in 4th chain from size hook *skip 1 2tr in next repeat from * to last treble_crochet in last st 76 the finished blanket measures 65cm by 75cm row 2 ch3 counts as st *2tr in between each set of gauge 2tr to create the v stitch repeat from * across to last treble_crochet in last st 12st and 8 row = 10cm by 10cm row 3-60 repeat row 2 changing colour each row key chain = chain chsp = chain space double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half treble treble_crochet = treble repeat = repeat rs = right side skip = skip space = space slip_stitch = slip_stitch ws = wrong side pattern copyright ©of hanjan pattern may not be resold in any format but items made from pattern may be sold all measurements and quantities are approximate hanjan crochet stitch share conversion i would love for you to share it would be amazing if we all photos of your finished item used the same terms for our with me here s how patterns but until we do here s a little cheat sheet to help you out uk us chain chain chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet half treble half_double_crochet half double half_double_crochet treble treble_crochet double double_crochet treble_crochet dtr treble treble_crochet triple treble ttr treble_crochet dtr hanjan online for your make sure you visit me online notes to find out about offers discounts free and new
